name: Cision - Distribution Platform Re-engineering and GEO Optimization
description: Modernized distribution platform and implemented Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) for leading media communications solutions provider, optimizing content for emerging digital platforms and AI-driven content discovery.
challenge: Legacy distribution platform with multiple technology stacks, fragile infrastructure requiring manual intervention, dated UI/UX, and manual deployment processes. Rising need to optimize content for Large Language Models (LLMs) and understand AI-driven traffic patterns.
solution: Re-engineered distribution platform with loosely coupled components, event-driven integrations, and containerized cloud-agnostic infrastructure. Implemented API abstraction, automated CI/CD, and centralized monitoring. Researched and implemented GEO strategies for LLM content optimization and AI-driven PR content approval workflows.
outcomes: 60% reduction in average production release rollout time with zero downtime
Platform handled 35% more orders than previously possible
Smooth AWS to GCP transition with just one week effort
99% correct prediction rate for AI content relevance
250 articles observed ranking high in GEO over 6-8 months
Approximately $113K savings on annual basis from automation
teamSize: Cloud-native engineering teams with AI/ML specialists
